column5: Start date: January 2024Keeping up isn’t enough. In AI, you need to be ahead of the game. Here, you’ll gain the digital skills and business acumen to thrive at the forefront of AI innovation.Businesses are in urgent need of AI specialists. This MSc will equip you with the vital technical skills, in-depth knowledge, and creative mindset to meet this demand right now, whilst paving the way for a rewarding, future-proofed career.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
